info.title: PagoPA API Debt Position Service V3

tags: Debt Positions API: Installments and Payment Options Manager
get.summary: Return the details of a specific debt position.
get.description: Return the details of a specific debt position.

parameters.name: organizationfiscalcode
parameters.description: Organization fiscal code, the fiscal code of the Organization.

parameters.name: iupd
parameters.description: IUPD (Unique identifier of the debt position). Format could be `<Organization fiscal code + UUID>` this would make it unique within the new PD management system. It's the responsibility of the EC to guarantee uniqueness. The pagoPa system shall verify that this is `true` and if not, notify the EC.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

example.message: You are not allowed to access this resource.

example.title: string
example.detail: There was an error processing the request

example.title: string
example.detail: There was an error processing the request

tags: Debt Positions API: Installments and Payment Options Manager
get.summary: Return the list of the organization debt positions. The due dates interval is mutually exclusive with the payment dates interval.
get.description: Return the list of the organization debt positions. The due dates interval is mutually exclusive with the payment dates interval.

parameters.name: organizationfiscalcode
parameters.description: Organization fiscal code, the fiscal code of the Organization.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of elements on one page. Default = 50

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Page value starts from 0

parameters.name: due_date_from
parameters.description: Filter from due_date (if provided use the format yyyy-MM-dd). If not provided will be set to 30 days before the due_date_to.

parameters.name: due_date_to
parameters.description: Filter to due_date (if provided use the format yyyy-MM-dd). If not provided will be set to 30 days after the due_date_from.

parameters.name: payment_date_from
parameters.description: Filter from payment_date (if provided use the format yyyy-MM-dd). If not provided will be set to 30 days before the payment_date_to.

parameters.name: payment_date_to
parameters.description: Filter to payment_date (if provided use the format yyyy-MM-dd). If not provided will be set to 30 days after the payment_date_from

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by debt position status

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Order by INSERTED_DATE, COMPANY_NAME, IUPD or STATUS

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Direction of ordering

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

example.title: string
example.detail: There was an error processing the request

example.message: You are not allowed to access this resource.

example.title: string
example.detail: There was an error processing the request

installmentMetadata.description: it can added a maximum of 10 key-value pairs for metadata

switchToExpired.description: feature flag to enable the payment option to expire after the due date

payStandIn.description: feature flag to enable a debt position in stand-in mode

hashDocument.description: Document hash type is stBase64Binary72 as described in https://github.com/pagopa/pagopa-api.

TransferMetadataModel.description: it can added a maximum of 10 key-value pairs for metadata

organizationFiscalCode.description: Fiscal code related to the organization targeted by this transfer.

postalIban.description: optional - can be combined with iban but not with stamp

transferMetadata.description: it can added a maximum of 10 key-value pairs for metadata

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and not localized); example: Service Unavailable

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: There was an error processing the request

limit.description: Required number of items per page

items_found.description: Number of items found. (The last page may have fewer elements than required)
